servers.name: dgx-b300
servers.notes: DGX B300: 8x GPUs Blackwell Ultra, 8x288GB HBM (=2.3TB), NVLink 14.4TB/s. Rack: 10U, Power: 14.5 kW, Heat: 49,476.054 BTUs/hr (max). Dados de Physical and Operational Specifications.

servers.name: dgx-b200
servers.notes: DGX B200: 8x B200 GPUs, 180GB HBM por GPU. Form Factor: 10U Rackmount, Power: 14.3 kW max. Dados de Mechanical e Power Specifications.
